price: Ɛda a εbεba no, onipa biara nnkasa, gyesε Nyankopͻn ma kwan. Wɔn mu bi bεyε tibͻnefoͻ εna (ebinom nso) bεyε tipafoᴐ.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفۡسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ فَمِنۡهُمۡ شَقِيّٞ وَسَعِيدٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma yati lā takallamu nafsun illā bi-idh'nihi famin'hum shaqiyyun wasaʿīdun
